FuncDef: The display arp packet statistics command displays the statistics about Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) packets.
CLIs: display arp packet statistics [ slot <slot-id> | interface [ <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a board. If this parameter is specified, the command displays ARP packet statistics of this board.
If this parameter is not specified, the command displays ARP packet statistics of all boards.
In VS mode, this parameter is supported only by the admin VS.
-

Displays the ARP packets sent and received by a specified a Layer 3 interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To locate ARP faults, run the display arp packet statistics command to view statistics about ARP packets.
Run the display arp packet statistics [ slot slot-id ] command to view the ARP packet statistics of a specified or all boards. The statistics include:Number of received ARP packets and ARP Miss messagesNumber of discarded ARP packets and ARP Miss messagesNumber of times that an ARP packet is learnedRun the display arp packet statistics interface command to view the statistics about the interfaces that send and receive ARP packets and ARP Miss messages and the statistics about the ARP packets. The statistics include:Number of ARP request packets sent and received by each interfaceNumber of ARP reply packets sent and received by each interfaceNumber of gratuitous ARP packets sent and received by each interfaceNumber of ARP Miss messages received by each interfaceNumber of ARP Miss messages discarded by each interfaceRun the display arp packet statistics interface interface-type interface-number command to check the statistics about ARP packets and ARP Miss messages sent and received on an interface. The statistics include:Number of ARP request packets sent and receivedNumber of ARP reply packets sent and receivedNumber of gratuitous ARP packets sent and receivedNumber of ARP Miss messages receivedNumber of ARP Miss messages discarded

Precautions
Run the display arp packet statistics interface command to view the interfaces that send and receive ARP packets and the statistics about the ARP packets.
The displayed statistics on an interface are the accumulative statistics about ARP packets sent and received by this interface.For example, if an interface sends a gratuitous ARP reply packet, the interface records the packet in the statistics about ARP reply packets as well as in the statistics about gratuitous ARP packets.
